titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to modify the depreciation of natural gas pipelines, equipment, and infrastructure assets to be 10-year property.
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to modify the depreciation of natural gas pipelines, equipment, and infrastructure assets to be 10-year property.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to classify natural gas distribution, storage, and transmission infrastructure assets as ten-year depreciable property.
